mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CART ( USER_ID, PRODUCT_ID, QTY, PRICE, TITLE, IMG_UUID, ADDED_AT ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{productId}, #{qty}, #{price}, #{title}, #{imgUuid}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP )
mapper.select: SELECT C.CART_ID, C.USER_ID, C.PRODUCT_ID, C.QTY, C.TITLE, C.ADDED_AT, P.PRICE, PI.IMG_UUID FROM CART C JOIN PRODUCT P ON C.PRODUCT_ID = P.PRODUCT_ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT PRODUCT_ID, IMG_UUID FROM PRODUCT_IMG LIMIT 1 ) PI ON P.PRODUCT_ID = PI.PRODUCT_ID WHERE C.USER_ID = #{userId}
SELECT CART_ID, USER_ID, PRODUCT_ID, QTY, TITLE, IMG_UUID, PRICE, ADDED_AT FROM CART WHERE CART_ID = #{cartId}
